page.title: 07INSIDE TAWSTOCK CHURCH
page.content: {OUR VISIT TO { TAWSTOCK CHURCH.} {Inside. { There were lots of memorial stones each very carefully decorated and completely different to the one next to it. There were lots of figures around in different places in the church all with history. Pictures on the walls, windows showed a different picture story on each. In one of the walls was carved a story of The Last Supper with Jesus and his disciples sitting round the table and Jesus breaking the bread. That story on the wall was one of the things I liked best there. Tawstock church is very beautiful as well as interesting.
